banner.description: I have a degree in Analysis and Systems Development from UNIMAR, and I have experience in the programming field as a web software developer. I love technology and am constantly seeking to enhance my skills with good programming practices, system architectures, and UI/UX.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description: Hi! My name is Yasmin, I love technology and Design. Combining the two, I create ideas and develop solutions using my creativity and knowledge. I am constantly learning new things and exploring innovative ways to create better applications.
about_me.sub_description: These are some of the technologies I have been working with recently:

jobs.title: Software Developer
description: Development on the accounting platform, using Angular framework on the front-end, Node.js and Typescript on the back-end, and PostgreSQL as the database.
Using Design Patterns, Facade, Adapter, Singleton, Decorators, MVC, etc.
Code organization with good programming practices, writing clean code and applying SOLID concepts.
Creation of unit tests with TDD principles using Jest and Jasmine.
Code versioning with Git and Git Flow.
Component documentation using Storybook and API documentation using Swagger.

jobs.title: Art Director
description: Creation of campaigns for various companies in the real estate and automotive sectors.
Creation of social media posts and email marketing.
Video editing, retouching, and image processing.
Creation of 3D stamps and development of Landing Pages.

jobs.title: Art Director
description: Creation of physical and digital pieces for various companies in various segments.
Development and unfolding of KVs for advertising campaigns, setting, and image manipulation.
Creation of social media posts, production of prints, and simple animations in videos.
Support in the web sector as front-end, development of Landing Pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Wordpress, performing the Design To Code conversion.

jobs.title: Administrative Management in Informatics
description: Administration of the computer area and support in the NFe issuance software.
Treatment of product images for the sales website.
Maintenance and control of spreadsheets using Excel.

projects.title: Project Title
projects.description: Here some description about the project
